guardrail-axioms.commenet: Logic skeleton that all guardrail proofs depend on

definitions.definition: Transformation that maps state to state while preserving constraint truth.

guardrail-axioms.axiom: FORALL state s: guardrails-begin invariants imply EXISTS constraint c such that c(s)=true.
FORALL constraint c satisfied at s, guardrails-middle fixed-point model ensures EXISTS enforcement e preserving c after any iteration.
FORALL enforcement e produced in guardrails-middle, guardrails-end handshake preserves e checksum if and only if telemetry hooks remain attached.
FORALL states s1,s2 with identical control-plane hashes, continuum bindings guarantee s1=s2 in observable outputs.
The validation-matrix in guardrails-middle is complete: FORALL scope,failure-mode pairs there exists at least one enforcement artifact.
